GraphPaths.Description: Centralized paths to graph files for easy reference and access.

CoreGraph.Description: The primary graph representing the entire filesystem structure.

CacheGraph.Description: A cached graph optimized for frequently accessed nodes and relationships.

MiniGraphs.Description: Directory containing mini-graphs for individual directories or domains.

ThemeRegistry.Description: Thematic mini-graph registry mapping themes to related mini-graphs.

Registry.Description: Mini-graph registry containing metadata and paths for all mini-graphs.

DefaultGraph.Description: Utilize ThemeRegistry for high-level themes and fallback to Registry for direct access.
DefaultGraph.FallbackStrategy: Traverse ThemeRegistry first, fallback to Registry for detailed exploration.

AccessRules.FallbackStrategy: Start with ThemeRegistry, expand to Registry, and traverse MiniGraphs before accessing CacheGraph or CoreGraph.

Keywords.Description: Keywords and metadata used to enhance graph traversal and search.

ThemeRegistry.Description: Thematic keywords extracted from theme-based graphs.

Registry.Description: Keywords and descriptions from the mini-graph registry.

Weighting.Description: Apply weighting to prioritize graphs and nodes based on keyword relevance.

ThemeRegistry.Description: Search for themes to narrow down graph traversal.

ExpandOn.Instruction: Use associated attributes or metadata from ThemeRegistry nodes to refine traversal.

Example.Action: Expand to mini-graphs matching these keywords.

PersonamodeTraversal.Description: Handle personamode-specific queries using personas_150.graph.json as default and fall back to registry.

Steps.Description: Start with the default graph for personamode queries.
If no match, traverse the ThemeRegistry to identify related mini-graphs.
If ThemeRegistry yields no results, fall back to the mini-graph Registry for detailed exploration.
For frequent queries, load the cache graph to optimize response times.

Registry.Description: Use the mini-graph registry for exact matches and metadata queries.

ExpandOn.Instruction: Use paths or metadata attributes from Registry nodes.

MiniGraphs.Description: Direct traversal of individual mini-graphs when required.
MiniGraphs.FallbackBehavior: Iterate all mini-graphs for unmatched queries.
